name: Lig Manuts At Obama's (LMAO)
description:
LMAO is a horror game based of the popular game Five nights at Freddy's. The game features a lot of memes and general shitposting.

The goal of the game is to survive 6 nights at "Gaben obama's normal pills" the gaming compound of obamium. Good luck finding the easter eggs and achievements.

For reporting any bugs or constructive criticism, feel free to contact me on discord RJVB09#4200 or via the comment section.

Have fun playing and shitting your pants.

好运！，电脑游戏人
